lakes.name: Van Lake
lakes.description: It has a border to Van and Bitlis provinces. Area (3713 km²) in terms of Turkey's largest lake. There is (Soda Water) in Lake Van.

lakes.name: Salt Lake
lakes.description: It has a border to Konya, Aksaray and Ankara provinces. Area (1300 km) in terms of Turkey's second largest lake. There is (Salt Water) in Tuz Gölü.

lakes.name: Beyşehir Lake
lakes.description: It has a border to Konya and Isparta provinces. Area (565 sq km) in terms of Turkey's third largest lake. There is (Fresh Water) in Beyşehir Lake.

lakes.name: Eğridir Lake
lakes.description: Isparta province has a border. Area (482 sq km) in terms of Turkey's fourth largest lake. There is (Fresh Water) in Eğirdir Lake.

lakes.name: İznik Lake
lakes.description: There is a border to Bursa province. Area (308 sq km), as is Turkey's fifth largest lake. There is (Fresh Water) in Iznik Lake.

lakes.name: Burdur Lake
lakes.description: It has a border to the provinces of Burdur and Isparta. Area (200 sq km) in terms of Turkey's sixth largest lake. There is (Brackish Water) in Lake Burdur.

lakes.name: Manyas Lake
lakes.description: It is also called Bird Lake. It has a border to the province of Balıkesir. Area (166 sq km) in terms of Turkey's seventh largest lake. There is (Fresh Water) in Lake Manyas.

lakes.name: Acıgöl Lake
lakes.description: It has a border to Afyonkarahisar and Denizli provinces. Area (153 sq km) in terms of Turkey's eighth largest lake. There is (Brackish Water) in Acıgöl.

lakes.name: Ulubat Lake
lakes.description: It has a border to Bursa province. Area (134 sq km) in terms of Turkey is the ninth largest lake. There is (Fresh Water) in Uluabat Lake.

lakes.name: Çıldır Lake
lakes.description: It has a border to Ardahan and Kars provinces. Area (115 sq km) in terms of Turkey's tenth largest lake. There is (Fresh Water) in Çıldır Lake.

lakes.name: Sapanca Lake
lakes.description: It has a border to Sakarya and Kocaeli provinces. Surface area (47 square kilometers) in terms of Turkey's largest lake eighteenth. There is (Fresh Water) in Sapanca Lake.
